t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I am here to inform that you were unable to turn off the spell, but inflicted damage on my mother.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Stop pointing out the obvious and move so that I can see her.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: She did it because she wanted all women in Gensokyo to look better.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I disagree. To some, how can they live without looking like the princess from that fairy tale?

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Even a princess wouldn't stand a demon king.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I've powered up to ensure you won't stand my new magic!
